t: Loresum Watches
s: Loresum Watches, a UK-based company specializing in bespoke timepieces. Our unique designs feature premium movements like Sellita SW200-1 and Miyota 9015, with modules including moonphase, jumping hour, and regulator. Each watch is crafted using no pre-made parts to ensure uniqueness.
